title: relationship
description: This object is used to link together other SDOs, such as Indicator, Observed Data, and Threat Actor in order to describe how those SDOs are related to each other.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `relationship`.

name.description: The name used to identify the relationship.

description.description: A description that helps provide context about the relationship.

source_ref.description: The ID of the source (from) object.

target_ref.description: The ID of the target (to) object.
